title: Wednesday Post Show (01-05-22)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (01-05-22)
description:
Bobby starts by talking to Amy about her doctor trying to set up her friend…and was wondering if it’s shady. Bobby talks about how he took a Master Class for Magic and shows off a trick to Amy. Phone Screener Abby reveals that she is still upset at the Christmas gift that Lunchbox got her during the show gift exchange. Amy shares an activity that her son was given at school about “What To Do If You’re Sad”? Bobby also talks about a new story of a radio host who was let go just 3 month shy of his 35th anniversary. Also, Lunchbox got a flat tire on his way into work and Bobby questions if it's time for another car.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
